about_the_game: In this exciting DLC, unlock Steve's Sky Loft and step into the world of a man whose success knows no bounds. Steve's life is a testament to power and glory, reflected in his lofty residence high above the city. Your task is to transform this sky-high abode into a striking symbol of his triumphs, creating an atmosphere that is as awe-inspiring as his achievements. Every design choice you make should echo Steve's magnificent journey and let the world know of the heights he's reached in life. Experience the thrill of living in the sky!
detailed_description: In this exciting DLC, unlock Steve's Sky Loft and step into the world of a man whose success knows no bounds. Steve's life is a testament to power and glory, reflected in his lofty residence high above the city. Your task is to transform this sky-high abode into a striking symbol of his triumphs, creating an atmosphere that is as awe-inspiring as his achievements. Every design choice you make should echo Steve's magnificent journey and let the world know of the heights he's reached in life. Experience the thrill of living in the sky!

short_description: Step into Steve's high-flying life in this DLC. Transform his sky-high residence to reflect his success. Design an abode that screams power, glory, and Steve's unmatched heights.
